Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.

CANNOT: Fails to clearly differentiate between plants with and without water or light (drawings look similar regardless of condition).

Omits labeling or uses labels incorrectly, such as calling a plant 'happy' or 'sad' instead of indicating water/light presence (labels do not reflect plant needs).
Misunderstands or overlooks changes in plant appearance due to lack of water or light, showing no awareness of withering or struggling (all plants look alive and thriving without distinction).
